title: Connecting to a Giving Community
intro_text: Giving comes in many forms. Join UCSF and support what matters to you most. You can join a dynamic group of like-minded, community-oriented people committed to a cause? Whether you are interested in groundbreaking research, life-saving treatment, world-class education or volunteering, UCSF makes it easy for you to get involved.

giving_pillar_items.copy_text: With annual gifts, UC San Francisco Society members fuel achievement and innovation in health and science, expand educational opportunities, promote public service, and foster investment in the health and well-being of the Bay Area and its citizens. Membership recognizes individuals making annual leadership gifts from $1,000 to $100,000.

link.label: LEAD BY EXAMPLE WITH AN ANNUAL LEADERSHIP GIFT

story.title: UCSF Event Brings Out the Best in Society
story.sub_title: UC San Francisco scientists strengthen the link between Zika virus and microcephaly.
